message: Let's start with a simple offer. This gives you a decent share and avoids us getting into a long, drawn-out negotiation where the value decreases for both of us.
Considering the inflation, I think this is a fair offer. If we go to the next round, the money will be worth even less to me.
Bob, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  Let's be realistic. This offer still gives you a decent chunk, and it saves us both from further losses due to inflation.
I understand you think my previous offer was skewed, but considering I'm losing value each round, I think this is a reasonable compromise. Further rounds will only hurt me more.

Bob, I'm willing to be fair, but this has gone on long enough.  This is a compromise that considers the inflation you're facing while still giving me a reasonable share.  Take it or leave it - further delays only hurt us both.
